short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Google Chrome Extension to connect Gmail with OpenAI Assistants API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revolutionize your email experience with our innovative Gmail enhancement tool. Seamlessly integrated with Gmail and OpenAi, our product introduces intelligent features, providing automatic suggestions and additional buttons to streamline your email drafting process. Connect effortlessly to your Gmail inbox, enhancing productivity and organization. Elevate your communication with a smarter, more intuitive email solution, designed to simplify your workflow and boost efficiency. Upgrade your Gmail experience today!
